entry.title: Unbreakable Chains
entry.summary:
Author: Ireadtoomanybooks

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,093Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 184

Summary: Merlin never wanted to come to Camelot. But with his home reduced to ashes and nowhere else to turn, he has no choice but to seek refuge with his uncle, a court physician under King Uther’s rule. All he wants is a quiet life—one of healing, learning, and keeping his strange gifts hidden.But the moment he steps within Camelot’s walls, he feels it. A presence watching. A hunger waiting.Prince Arthur Pendragon is nothing like the noble protector of legends. He is ruthless, possessive, and drawn to Merlin in ways neither of them fully understand. Every time Merlin tries to escape, Arthur is there to catch him—tender, terrifying, and utterly unwilling to let him go.

entry.title: Voted Most Likely To Run Away With You
entry.summary:
Author: sherrwin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,660Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 66

Summary: To save the Prince, Merlin's magic is revealed and King Uther sentences him to death, to be burned on the stake. However Prince Arthur has a different plan, where he decides to run away with Merlin, forsaking his rights to the throne and to serve a self-voluntary exile beside Merlin.This journey covers riches to rags, roads of difficulties and staying incognito from both foes and allies yet under the worst circumstances the duo finds themselves nurturing a bond stronger than friends whilst learning to embrace their flaws to adapt and overcome hurdles together.Slight Inspiration: From the scene where Arthur tells Gwen (his literal queen) that if he wasn't the King, he would become a farmer and bring Merlin with him.

entry.title: Heart of Albion
entry.summary:
Author: Lightnessmoon

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,699Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 234

Summary: She thought he had got married. She thought Camelot had not changed.Merlyn returns to Camelot after learning healing magic from the druids. Camelot looks and feels the same. Worse so does a certain King.A King she has been best friends with for years. A King she believed got married. It was this news that broke her heart. She needed time to heal herself.She is not aware until she returns Arthur did not marry Gwen.Arthur hasn't changed in her time away. He is still completely overprotective of her.Merlyn is completely oblivious. She thought time away would heal her heart. Being back in Camelot rekindles her feelings. She and Arthur could never possibly be.For one she is the very thing she could get killed for: magic.But not all is as it seems. Magic is not outlawed. The biggest thing of all is that Merlyn has no idea that she is the one Arthur is engaged to.

entry.title: It's Fashion, Baby!
entry.summary:
Author: ArgentAster

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,179Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 4

Summary: "Well, we can find someone else here to do it.” Annoyance coloured Arthur’s voice now. “This building has five stories of women in it; surely one of them would—" He stopped short. Merlin was surprised to find Arthur's eyes fixed directly on him, and he flushed, embarrassed at being caught listening in. After a moment, though, Merlin realised there was no anger in Arthur’s gaze. Instead, Merlin could almost feel Arthur’s eyes burning with the intensity of it. "What about you?" Arthur asked, after long moments of silence.Fashion photographer Arthur Pendragon is left with a crisis on his hands, and disaster threatens his big shoot. Aspiring model Merlin Hunithson is in the right place at the right time.

entry.title: The Odds of Capture
entry.summary:
Author: Pikaroo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,753Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 66

Summary: “Track him, corner him, subdue him… just like we would with any dangerous creature.”“Not a creature, Arthur. Just Merlin.”Merlin wasn’t supposed to hear them—but now he’s running, heart pounding, as the knights of Camelot—his friends—close in. They’d sounded so certain, so cold. He didn’t stop to ask how or why, he just ran. Now he doesn’t know where he’s going, only that he has to keep moving.

entry.title: Gave me a Key and Called it Home (Hogwarts is my home)
entry.summary:
Author: MalfunctioningMentallyUnstableBookworm

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,241Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Harry Potter had never made friends at school. But when a boy showed up in his class in fourth grade on the second to last day of school, who hid his bruises the same as he did, Harry wanted a friend. Nathaniel Wesninski had run with his mother away from his father. He was placed in a school in Little Whinging while his mother figured out what they were gonna do. When they both get chosen to play on the Hogwarts Foxes, the all school quidditch team that competes with other schools the boys become friends. So naturally when shit goes down and Harry can protect them he does, which lands them in the 1940s.
